recipe.title: Crispy Salt-and-Vinegar Potatoes
ingredients: 2 pounds baby Yukon Gold potatoes, halved, quartered if large
1 cup plus 2 tablespoons distilled white vinegar
instructions: Combine potatoes, 1 cup vinegar, and 1 tablespoon kosher salt in a medium saucepan; add water to cover by 1". Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until potatoes are tender, 20–25 minutes; drain and pat dry.

Heat butter in a large skillet over mediumhigh heat. Add potatoes; season with kosher salt and pepper. Cook, tossing occasionally, until golden brown and crisp, 8–10 minutes. Drizzle with remaining 2 tablespoons vinegar. Serve topped with chives and sea salt.
